meanings.definition: A period of time between events
meanings.sent1: She took short intervals between studying to rest her mind.
meanings.sent2: The intervals between classes allowed students to grab a quick snack.
meanings.sent3: During the movie, the character kept pausing at random intervals to tell jokes.
meanings.sent4: The intervals of silence during the meeting were filled with awkward glances.
meanings.sent5: The intervals of sunlight streaming through the window marked the passage of time.

meanings.sent1: The intervals between the trees in the forest were filled with wildflowers.
meanings.sent2: The intervals between the houses were small, but each had a unique garden.
meanings.sent3: The cat loved to hide in the intervals between the furniture pieces.
meanings.sent4: The intervals of darkness between the streetlights made the road eerie at night.
meanings.sent5: The intervals of laughter from the party next door echoed through the walls.

meanings.definition: A musical distance between two notes
meanings.sent1: The song sounded beautiful with the perfect intervals between the notes.
meanings.sent2: The musician practiced getting the intervals just right on the piano.
meanings.sent3: The intervals between the high and low notes created a unique melody.
meanings.sent4: The intervals of silence in the music added suspense to the performance.
meanings.sent5: The intervals of harmony between the singers gave the song a magical quality.
